price: ムーサー*は言った。「フィルアウン*よ、私はまさに全創造物の主*からの使徒*です。
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَٰفِرۡعَوۡنُ إِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā yāfir'ʿawnu innī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
